forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Some clouds this morning will give way to generally sunny skies for the afternoon. High near 65F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early with increasing clouds overnight. Low 12C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy this evening with more clouds for overnight. Low 53F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 19C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine and clouds mixed. High 67F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy skies. High 17C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Mainly cloudy. High 64F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 12C. Winds light and variable. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 58F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain diminishing to a few showers late. Low 46F. Winds N at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning, then clearing with ample sunshine in the afternoon. High 14C. Winds NNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with mostly sunny conditions later in the day. High 58F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low 8C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear evening skies will give way to mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low around 45F. Winds NNE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 61F. Winds NNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear during the evening followed by mostly cloudy skies overnight. Low around 50F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.fcttext: Sunshine along with some cloudy intervals. High 63F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy in the morning then becoming cloudy with periods of rain later in the day. High 17C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to cloudy skies and rain in the afternoon. High 63F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 52F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds early, otherwise mostly sunny. High 61F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
